sentence.Network_cn: 有人劝他不要吃得太多.

entry.def: If you say that someone overeats, you mean they eat more than they need to or more than is healthy.

example.ex: If you tend to overeat because of depression, first take steps to recognize the source of your sadness.
example.tran: 如果你常常因为沮丧而暴饮暴食，首先应该设法找到悲伤的原因。
辛辣食品吃得过多的人

means.word_mean: 1. overeat or eat immodestly; make a pig of oneself;
